post.text: When Trump trivializes the sacrifice of our military and veterans, he makes it clear: He has no idea what service to this country means.

comment.author: James
comment.text: What people are missing is the fact that Trump only exists as a candidate because there are racist, homophobic, intolerant, white supremacist, ignorant, undereducated people that are more than willing to support him. Don't blame Trump, he's just the clown on the stage. Blame the morons that come out in mass to cheer on the clown's performance. No audience, no clown show.
